children.type: string | number | bigint | boolean | ReactElement<unknown, string | JSXElementConstructor<any>> | Iterable<ReactNode> | ReactPortal | Promise<...> | ((props: EditableElementProps) => ReactNode)

errorBorderColor.description: The border color when the input is invalid.

focusBorderColor.description: The border color when the input is focused.

defaultValue.description: The initial value of the Editable in both edit & preview mode.

placeholder.description: The placeholder text when the value is empty.

previewFocusable.description:
If `true`, the read only view, has a `tabIndex` set to `0`
so it can receive focus via the keyboard or click.

selectAllOnFocus.description: If `true`, the input's text will be highlighted on focus.

startWithEditView.description: If `true`, the Editable will start with edit mode by default.

submitOnBlur.description: If `true`, it'll update the value onBlur and turn off the edit mode.

value.description: The value of the Editable in both edit & preview mode.

onCancel.description:
Callback invoked when user cancels input with the `Esc` key.
It provides the last confirmed value as argument.

onChange.description: A callback invoked when user changes input.

onEdit.description: A callback invoked once the user enters edit mode.

onSubmit.description: A callback invoked when user confirms value with `enter` key or by blurring input.

disabled.description: If `true`, the field will be disabled.

invalid.description: If `true`, the field will be invalid.

readOnly.description: If `true`, the field will be readonly.

required.description: If `true`, the field will be required.

asChild.description: Merges its props onto its immediate child.
